episodes.title: Cults & Consequences
episodes.description: On today’s podcast we did a deep dive into Dancing for the Devil, the Netflix show about an alleged cult linked to the founder of 7M Films, a talent management company for TikTok dancers. At what point do your children stop listening to you as a parent? It just goes to show how powerful the love for a partner can be compared to that of a parent or family member. As moms, it is heartbreaking to watch a child make decisions that are completely out of your control—decisions that are not benefiting their health or safety.
